ovdesc.p: A record to be created for sorting, this record will have a mandatory record “SYSTEM”, which will be the one by default.
A sorting record can be created for each queue.
Must be valid QUEUE Id or "SYSTEM"

desc.p: This field with the next field allows assigning a weight to the OUTSTANING AMOUNT of the COLLECTION ITEM record based on the value of this amount.
The weight to be given to the up to amount defined in the previous field.
This field with the next field allows assigning a weight to the OVERDUE AMOUNT of the COLLECTION ITEM record based on the value of this amount.
The weight to be given to the up to amount defined in the previous field.
Which weight to be given to items with black-list flag is ‘Y’.
